author: Warhammer
description:
Okay, so Warhammer: The Horus Heresy – Saturnine looks awesome, but how do you actually play the game? Watch the video to find out!

author: Warhammer
description:
Watch along as Adam shows you how to paint Arjac Rockfist so he looks awesome and is ready to crush his enemies with the mighty Foehammer!

Here's a list of the paints, brushes, and tools used in this tutorial:

Base:
Abaddon Black
Grey Seer
Iron Warriors
Khorne Red
Mephiston Red
Rhinox Hide
Runelord Brass

Layer:
Administratum Grey
Blue Horror
Canoptek Alloy
Dawnstone
Eshin Grey
Fenrisian Grey
Fire Dragon Bright
Kislev Flesh
Phalanx Yellow
Runefang Steel
Stormhost Silver
White Scar
Wild Rider Red
Zamesi Desert

Contrast:
Blood Angels Red
Darkoath Flesh
Gryph-Hound Orange
Wyldwood

Technical:
Lahmian Medium
Valhallan Blizzard

Tools:
S Base Brush
M Layer Brush
S Layer Brush
M Shade Brush
Texture Tool

If you're new to painting, our Citadel Colour Painting Essentials playlist hosts an array of beginner-friendly videos to help you get started.

Follow for more Warhammer, more often:

- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/warhammerofficial/
- Threads: https://www.threads.net/@warhammero
title: How To Paint: Arjac Rockfist | Warhammer 40,000

author: Warhammer
description:
